items.sentence: I\'ll do my best not to disturb your studying.
Mary never told us that Tom was her boyfriend.
Mary opened her purse and looked around in it.
Mary showed up at school wearing a nice dress.
Mary told Tom about what John asked her to do.
Mary told Tom not to kiss her in public again.
Who\'s taking responsibility for this problem?
Why don\'t you just admit that you were wrong?
Why don\'t you stick around for a few minutes?
I\'ve got a toothache. The pain is killing me.
